select u.user_id adminUserId, u.username userName, wm_concat(NVL(r.role_name, '-')) roleName, NVL(au.userName,'-') createAdminUser, NVL2(u.create_time, to_char(u.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), '') createTime from ADMIN_USER u left join admin_user_r_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join admin_role r on ur.admin_role_id = r.admin_role_id left join ADMIN_USER au on u.create_user_id = au.user_id
and u.delete_flag = 'N'
and r.admin_role_id = #{map.adminRoleId}
and u.username like '%'|| #{map.userName} || '%'
group by u.user_id ,u.username, au.userName, NVL2(u.create_time, to_char(u.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), '') order by NVL2(u.create_time, to_char(u.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), '') desc

select au.user_id as adminUserId, au.username as userName, au.realname as realName, NVL(au.contact,'-') as contact, au.position as position, au.locked as locked from ADMIN_USER au where 1 = 1
and au.username like '%' || #{map.userName} || '%' ESCAPE '/'
and au.realname like '%' || #{map.realName} || '%' ESCAPE '/'
and au.contact like '%' || #{map.contact} || '%' ESCAPE '/'
and au.position like '%' || #{map.position} || '%' ESCAPE '/'
and au.locked=#{map.state}
and (au.user_id in ( select a.user_id from ADMIN_USER a left join project_r_user pr on pr.user_id=a.user_id where pr.project_id=#{map.projectId} and a.locked='Y') or user_id in (select a.user_id from project p left join ADMIN_USER a on a.user_id=p.manager_id
where p.project_id=#{map.projectId})
or au.locked='N')
order by au.create_time DESC
